title: 50 shades of grey (movie poster)
content:
Hi,

I'm trying to identify the typo from (frenche) movie poster of 50 shade of grey.  
better size of the picture : [http://fr.web.img1.acsta.net/pictures/14/11/14/11/08/371396.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150327015259/http:/fr.web.img1.acsta.net/pictures/14/11/14/11/08/371396.jpg "http://fr.web.img1.acsta.net/pictures/14/11/14/11/08/371396.jpg")

Thanks a lot !

Font: 

 Bauer Bodoni

comments.content: 'CINQUANTE NUANCES DE GREY': [Bauer Bodoni](http://web.archive.org/web/20150327015259/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/bauer+bodoni) (any version except Bitstream because of /Q tail terminal)
